    • Constructor Detail

      • EmojIconActions

        public EmojIconActions(android.content.Context ctx,
                       android.view.View rootView,
                       EmojiconEditText emojiconEditText,
                       android.widget.ImageView emojiButton)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context of current activity.
        rootView - The top most layout in your view hierarchy. The difference of this view and the screen height will be used to calculate the keyboard height.
        emojiconEditText - The Id of EditText.
        emojiButton - The Id of ImageButton used to open Emoji

      • EmojIconActions

        public EmojIconActions(android.content.Context ctx,
                       android.view.View rootView,
                       EmojiconEditText emojiconEditText,
                       android.widget.ImageView emojiButton,
                       java.lang.String iconPressedColor,
                       java.lang.String tabsColor,
                       java.lang.String backgroundColor)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context of current activity.
        rootView - The top most layout in your view hierarchy. The difference of this view and the screen height will be used to calculate the keyboard height.
        emojiconEditText - The Id of EditText.
        emojiButton - The Id of ImageButton used to open Emoji
        iconPressedColor - The color of icons on tab
        tabsColor - The color of tabs background
        backgroundColor - The color of emoji background
